name: ESGO 2016 State of the Art Gynaecological Oncology Conference
content: The European Society of Gynaecological Oncology (ESGO) reveals the latest clinical practice and research developments in Gynaecological Cancers prevention at ESGO 2016, State of the Art Conference, a multidisciplinary congress dedicated to the topic of prevention in Cervical, Endometrial, Ovarian and Breast Cancers as well as the new HPV Vaccination Regimen overview and future impact. The program will incorporate presentations by world premier Gynaecological Cancers experts as well as video Workshop on Vulvar and minor Cervical Cancer surgery, special courses on colposcopy and minimal invasive surgery for the young generation of professionals and a workshop for cancer advocacy groups. ESGO 2016 program will incorporate oral and poster sessions, bringing the latest research in gynaecological oncology to attendees across Europe. Abstracts submissions will be open until May 15, 2016\. Don't miss out on the opportunity to join peers and key opinion leaders in Antalya, Turkey, September 08-10, 2016\. Get a head start, visit ESGO 2016 Conference website.
